pullRequest.title: Update dutch localization
pullRequest.bodyText:
as unofficial ambassador of windmills and cheese, i bring you an update to the dutch bundle:
This is by no means perfect (didn't manage to attempt to translate anything and everything since that would probably cause confusion and a lot of things don't really have a proper translation, but the most important stuff should be covered reasonably well)
hopefully this is enough to get a double role as well, since i envy the the others ❤️


did i make this mainly for the chance of getting a double role? yea kinda, but it does help the community, and while the translating was painstaking i kept pushing on, it was calming in a way, and i have added respect now for the other translators of the game, its a pretty tough job 🤔

oh, and to prove that my request for a dutch/nederlands language specific channel is justified (^_^)
(if this gets merged/reviewed i might try to put additional effort into translating all of the block names & descriptions as well, the hard parts always come last 🙈)

commit.message:
Update 🇳🇱 bundle

Wow this took several hours, didn’t expect that. 🙈

nodes.bodyText:
choco kast ikke pakke
Did the verb in this sentence go on vacation?

nodes.bodyText:
Om er vanaf te komen, verwijder die mod.
This is not a Dutch sentence due to multiple reasons:

er vanaf -> ervanaf
The subject in the first part of this sentence is transitive towards the second part of the sentence. This means the item mentioned is ordered to remove the mod.
I suggest rewriting this bit entirely.

nodes.bodyText:
aparaat -> apparaat
Additionally, I highly advise against using Client and Device in a mixed way. They have very distinct and separate meanings. (Client is a perfectly usable Dutch word as I found out earlier this month.)

nodes.bodyText: This verb demands to be amended with something that took too long. I'll give in on the fact that Dutch has no fitting translation for the source string, as such it is fine for this to remain unchanged, but it is broken Dutch.

nodes.bodyText:
Ik ken zelf geen enkel bedrijf dat knapzakken maakt waarin honderden blokken koper, glas, titanium, plastanium, ... passen. Laat staan dat je die daarna nog zou kunnen optillen.
Startinventaris?

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.

nodes.bodyText:
What are schrimmels? (General typo)
industriele -> industriële
generators Generators van wat?
Leer hoe te repareren Litteral backtranslation: Learn to repair. I believe this sentence in the sourcestring makes use of the name of the mender block specifically to hint at you having to use them in this zone, but I am not sure. @Anuken might be able to clear things up here.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.

This needs some work.
herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog This part of the sentence doesn't appear to serve any purpose. Connect it to the rest of the translation.
Herrover -> Herover
Verzamel -> Delf (Can remain unchanged.)
Pomp water in je wapens en boren. Where has the to cool connotation gone?

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.

nodes.bodyText:
The first comma has no right to be there.
Connect Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. and Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. with a comma or maybe even ... maar ...
ervan -> hiervan
... nog overeind, \nGa door met ... -> ... nog overeind. \nGa door met ...

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.

inland -> naar het binnenland
berijkt!
bereikt -> aangetast

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.

nodes.bodyText:
[accent]lanceren[] -> [accent] lanceren[]
Waarmee ... Waarmee? Dutch transitivity rules dictate that this word cannot transfer its subject across a full stop.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.

nodes.bodyText:
installatie
The first comma should be sent on permanent vacation. It has no right to be there.
Toepassingen zijn van iets, niet voor iets.
aanwezig <-> hier
scouting in the source string doesn't really have a Dutch translation in this context. Suggestion: constant waakzaam voor aanvallers

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.

nodes.bodyText:
hogere or hoger gelegen, not a combination of the two.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.
+zone.fungalPass.description = Een transitiegebied tussen de hoger bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gestationeerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.
+zone.fungalPass.description = Een transitiegebied tussen de hoger bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gestationeerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.
+zone.fungalPass.description = Een transitiegebied tussen de hoger bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gestationeerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.
+zone.fungalPass.description = Een transitiegebied tussen de hoger bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gestationeerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.

 zone.impact0078.name = Impact 0078
 zone.crags.name = Crags
-zone.fungalPass.name = Fungal Pass
-zone.groundZero.description = The optimal location to begin once more. Low enemy threat. Few resources.\nGather as much lead and copper as possible.\nMove on.
-zone.frozenForest.description = Even here, closer to mountains, the spores have spread. The fridgid temperatures cannot contain them forever.\n\nBegin the venture into power. Build combustion generators. Learn to use menders.
-zone.desertWastes.description = These wastes are vast, unpredictable, and criss-crossed with derelict sector structures.\nCoal is present in the region. Burn it for power, or synthesize graphite.\n\n[lightgray]This landing location cannot be guaranteed.
-zone.saltFlats.description = On the outskirts of the desert lie the Salt Flats. Few resources can be found in this location.\n\nThe enemy has erected a resource storage complex here. Eradicate their core. Leave nothing standing.
-zone.craters.description = Water has accumulated in this crater, relic of the old wars. Reclaim the area. Collect sand. Smelt metaglass. Pump water to cool turrets and drills.
-zone.ruinousShores.description = Past the wastes, is the shoreline. Once, this location housed a coastal defense array. Not much of it remains. Only the most basic defense structures have remained unscathed, everything else reduced to scrap.\nContinue the expansion outwards. Rediscover the technology.
-zone.stainedMountains.description = Further inland lie the mountains, yet untainted by spores.\nExtract the abundant titanium in this area. Learn how to use it.\n\nThe enemy presence is greater here. Do not give them time to send their strongest units.
-zone.overgrowth.description = This area is overgrown, closer to the source of the spores.\nThe enemy has established an outpost here. Build dagger units. Destroy it. Reclaim that which was lost.
-zone.tarFields.description = The outskirts of an oil production zone, between the mountains and desert. One of the few areas with usable tar reserves.\nAlthough abandoned, this area has some dangerous enemy forces nearby. Do not underestimate them.\n\n[lightgray]Research oil processing technology if possible.
-zone.desolateRift.description = An extremely dangerous zone. Plentiful resources, but little space. High risk of destruction. Leave as soon as possible. Do not be fooled by the long spacing between enemy attacks.
-zone.nuclearComplex.description = A former facility for the production and processing of thorium, reduced to ruins.\n[lightgray]Research the thorium and its many uses.\n\nThe enemy is present here in great numbers, constantly scouting for attackers.
-zone.fungalPass.description = A transition area between high mountains and lower, spore-ridden lands. A small enemy reconnaissance base is located here.\nDestroy it.\nUse Dagger and Crawler units. Take out the two cores.
+zone.fungalPass.name = Schimmelpad
+zone.groundZero.description = De optimale plek om weer tot kracht te komen. Weinig gevaar. Weinig grondstoffen.\nVerzamel zoveel mogelijk lood en koper als je kan.\nEn vertrek.
+zone.frozenForest.description = Ook hier, dicht bij de bergen, hebben de schrimmels zich verspreid. De koude tempratuur houd ze niet voor eeuwig tegen.\n\nBegin de industriele revolutie. Bouw fossiele generators. Leer hoe te repareren.
+zone.desertWastes.description = Deze woestijn is groot, onvoorspelbaar, en vol met oude technologie.\nSteenkool is hier te vinden. Verbrand het om stroom op te wekken, or verwerk het in grafiet.\n\n[lightgray]Of het hier veilig is is een tweede.
+zone.saltFlats.description = Aan de randen van de woestijn liggen de zoutvlaktes. Weinig grondstoffen zijn hier te vinden.\n\nDe vijand heeft hier rantsoenen opgeslagen. Vernietig hun core. Laat niks staan.
+zone.craters.description = Water heeft zich hier opgehoopt, herrinering aan de vroegere oorlog. Herrover dit gebied. Verzamel zand. Maak glas. Pomp water in je wapens en boren.
+zone.ruinousShores.description = Voorbij de ruines, is de kust. Lang geleden werd de kust hier verdedigd. Weinig ervan is terug te vinden. Enkel de meest simpele verdedigingswerken staan nog overeind, \nGa door met uitbereiden, herontdek de verloren techniek.
+zone.stainedMountains.description = Verder inland liggen de bergen, nog niet berijkt door schimmels.\nVerzamel de grote hoeveelheiden titanium in het gebied. Leer hoe je het kan gebruiken.\n\nDe vijand is krachtig hier. Geef ze geen tijd om je te overrompelen.
+zone.overgrowth.description = Dit gebied is overgroeid, dichter bij de bron van de schimmels.\nDe vijand heeft hier een uitkijkpost. Bouw dolk units. Vernietig hen. Claim was verloren was.
+zone.tarFields.description = De randen van een olie productie veld, tussen de bergen en de woestijn. Een van de weinige plekken met bruikbare olie.\nOndanks dat het verbannen is, zijn er wel krachtige vijanden in de buurt. Onderschat ze niet.\n\n[lightgray]Onderzoek wat je met olie kan doen indien mogelijk.
+zone.desolateRift.description = Een super gevaarlijk gebied. Veel grondstoffen, maar weinig ruimte. Grote kans op verwoesting. Lanceer zo snel mogelijk. Word niet overmoedig door de lange tijd tussen de rondes.
+zone.nuclearComplex.description = Een voormalige instalatie voor de productie en verwerking van thorium, ligt er nu verlaten bij.\n[lightgray]Onderzoek thorium en de vele toepassingen ervoor.\n\nDe vijand is aanwezig hier in grote getalen, constant aan het zoeken voor aanvallers.
+zone.fungalPass.description = Een transitiegebied tussen de hoger bergen en de lagergelegen, beschimmelde gebieden. Een kleine verkenningsbasis is hier gestationeerd.\nVernietig het.\nGebruik Dolk en Kruiper units. Maak de twee cores onbruikbaar.
